name: Pong Punch Party
description:
Pong Punch Party (or PPP) is a local 1v1 pong-like game!
In order to play the Duel Mode (the main mode) you need to setup 2 controllers. 

The game is still in development, so you may find some bugs; But whether you find some or not, feel free to send some feedback my way on the page's comment section, or email me at gabriel.s.raposo@gmail. 

Audio files credits sheet

OST Composer's sound cloud: https://soundcloud.com/zerosteele 
Full and proper crediting can be found inside the game.

If you are from Brazil too, please consider reading the ReadMe inside the rar file.
